title: Crack the Algorithm (Like a Roblox Code)
objectives: Reverse-engineer why some TikToks flop (plot views vs. watch time)
Design a ‘fake’ viral trend using A/B testing (test emoji captions vs. no captions)
Predict your BFF’s next Roblox outfit using data from their shop history

methodology.case_study: How *Starbucks* hacked teen brains with TikTok drinks
methodology.interactive: Roleplay as an algorithm—troll your friends by ‘boosting’ their bad posts

validation.benchmark: Make a post with 2x more likes than usual
